pages.text:
EVENTS
Bingo Night - Tuesdays at 8pm
3 rounds – first round winner gets a free drink, second round gets $10 off your tab, third round gets $15 off your tab.
Movie Night - Thursdays at 8pm
Run by the most knowledgeable and passionate movie buff you’ll ever meet, with a curated pre-show that offers insight and context of the evening’s feature film.
Trivia - Fridays at 8pm
3 rounds – teams of up to 5 and $30 bar tab up for grabs.
Join us For Happy Hour Daily from 4PM to 7PM and get 25% off all drinks (except canned beverages)!

NAME
EMAIL
SUBSCRIBE
Rave Reviews
★★★★★
Such a relaxing place. Friendly staff and patrons. Delicious, calming beverages. So many choices, thankfully the bartenders know what to suggest, depending on what vibe you're seeking. I definitely recommend this place!!! Oh can't forget their rewards punch card! It's a 10/10 for me!! I keep remembering more things to include in my review, pool table !! OK now I'm done. Enjoy.
Christy Black
Good spot that has an island vibe and cool classic movies from the 60’s playing. Not overly decorated tacky like some places are. Great prices too. Funny “gullible” on the ceiling was a nice touch too. Pool table also a nice bonus.
Victoria Pod
I’ve been to kava cove only a handful of times. However, this place has an incredible amount of charm! The employees are engaged and kind, especially Sarah (or maybe it was Sally). I just went today with my SO and we were both met with amazing customer service. Definitely one of the best around!
Eric K

Nestled in the heart of Winter Park, FL, Kava Cove Lounge is a family-owned lounge dedicated to bringing people together through the calming and communal experience of Kava.

ABOUT
Locally owned since 2016
Nestled in the heart of Winter Park, FL, Kava Cove Lounge is a family-owned lounge dedicated to bringing people together through the calming and communal experience of Kava. Rooted in tradition and infused with a warm, welcoming atmosphere, our lounge is a space where relaxation, conversation, and community flourish.
Passionate about holistic wellness
As a family passionate about holistic wellness and meaningful connections, we wanted to create a place where people can unwind, share stories, and embrace the age-old tradition of kava drinking. Our journey started with a love for Pacific Island culture and the powerful effects of kava, leading us to open Kava Cove Lounge as a sanctuary from the hustle of everyday life.
Our mission
Our mission is to provide a space where people from all walks of life can come together, disconnect from the digital world, and reconnect with themselves and others. We are committed to serving premium kava in a pleasant, inclusive environment that nurtures relaxation and friendship.
A drink for every taste bud
At Kava Cove Lounge, we offer a variety of kava options to suit every taste and preference. From traditional kava shells to unique blends, each drink is crafted to provide maximum relaxation and enjoyment. For those new to kava, our knowledgeable staff is happy to guide you through the different options and help you find the perfect drink. We continually update our menu with seasonal specials and new blends, ensuring a fresh and exciting experience with each visit.
Events that bring community together
Our mission is to provide a space where people from all walks of life can come together, disconnect from the digital world, and reconnect with themselves and others. We are committed to serving premium kava in a pleasant, inclusive environment that nurtures relaxation and friendship.
Join us For Happy Hour Daily from 4PM to 7PM and get 25% off all drinks (except canned beverages)!
